Package im.tox.jtoxcore

This package supplies the base classes needed for using the Tox library in java.

See: Description

    This is the main wrapper class for the tox library.

    Bean for a friend in Tox.
    ToxWorker<F extends ToxFriend>

    Exception Description
    FriendExistsException
    Exception to be thrown if a friend is added to a Friendlist even though a friend with that number already exists.

    Exception class used in the Tox project.

Package im.tox.jtoxcore Description

This package supplies the base classes needed for using the Tox library in java.

The main class is JTox, which enables the creation of native tox instances, and all interaction with these.

Note to Android developers: You should be able to create a subclass of this that implements the Parcelable interface, so you can pass JTox instances around between different Activities.
